nodes.text: The Assailer was a Raider-class corvette which, during the Imperial Era, formed part of the Imperial Navy. The corvette boasted sublight engines and measured 150 meters in length.

The Assailer was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon on a card of the same name in the 2019 Huge Ship Conversion Kit, an expansion for Fantasy Flight Games' miniatures game Star Wars: X-Wing Second Edition.
The vessel originally appeared in the Star Wars Legends continuity, in the Imperial Raider Expansion Pack for Star Wars: X-Wing Miniatures Game, also by Fantasy Flight Games and released in 2015.
